sections.heading: recipients; rules and regulations
sections.text: Any county which establishes a vocational, rehabilitation, job training, or community service program shall adopt and promulgate written rules and regulations to ensure fair and equitable treatment of employable recipients of general assistance.SourceLaws 1990, LB 4

68-154.Employable recipients; rules and regulations.

Any county which establishes a vocational, rehabilitation, job training, or community service program shall adopt and promulgate written rules and regulations to ensure fair and equitable treatment of employable recipients of general assistance.

SourceLaws 1990, LB 422, ยง 4;Laws 1991, LB 227, ยง 4.
